sentences.sentence: The value of America keep stable between 2010 and 2014; while India decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2014.
The value of 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013 and 2014 in India is greatly lower America.

sentences.sentence: The value of America keep stable between 2010 and 2014; while India decrease with steady steps between 2010 and 2014.
The value of 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013 and 2014 in India is greatly lower America.
